document_data.name: The Music Box
document_data.mainbody: '''The Music Box''' was a devious and exotic torture device.
document_data.Description: This mechanism, was  facetiously called for its functionality and form. The Music Box was a [[humanoid]]-sized cage with its bars created out of tuning forks. Once hit, the cage started reverberating with high-pitched tones, eventually driving the victim locked inside insane and causing profuse ear bleeding.
document_data.History: In [[1372 DR]], one of these devices could be found in [[Daggerford]]'s curio shop, [[Stop Hole Abbey]]. However, at the time, the Music Box was not for sale as per the store owner, [[Vladmyr]].
